theInterloper:Defend.NAME: Defend
theInterloper:Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Flame Barrier.

theInterloper:Exploit.NAME: Exploit
theInterloper:Exploit.DESCRIPTION: Expunge Vulnerability. NL Deal !D! for each expunged stack.

theInterloper:CodeReview.NAME: Code Review
theInterloper:CodeReview.DESCRIPTION: At end of a turn apply debuff to enemy based on their intent.

theInterloper:Exploit3.NAME: Exploit
theInterloper:Exploit3.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL (Deal X damage total.)

theInterloper:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theInterloper:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theInterloper:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theInterloper:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theInterloper:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theInterloper:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theInterloper:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theInterloper:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theInterloper:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and poison to an enemy.
